alert.note: Alert for Coconino (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 07 at 12:10PM MST until August 07 at 3:15PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... The Museum Fire scar area in... Coconino County in north central Arizona... * Until 315 PM MST. * At 1209 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Museum Fire scar area. Between 0.75 and 1.25 inches of rain have fallen according to area automatic rain gauges. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Museum Fire scar area. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Museum Fire scar area. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Flagstaff. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Schultz Creek. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Immediately move out of and away from creeks and washes in the Museum Fire scar area. Flash flooding is occurring or imminent. Turn Around, Don`t Drown if you encounter flood waters while driving.
